name: onrr-generate-uuid
description: Custom operation extension for generating uuids in flows.

scripts.build: directus-extension build; mkdir -p ../../../../extensions/directus-extension-onrr-generate-uuid/dist; cp package.json ../../../../extensions/directus-extension-onrr-generate-uuid; cp dist/*.js ../../../../extensions/directus-extension-onrr-generate-uuid/dist
